questions.question: What is the difference between a frame by frame and a motion capture?
questions.correct_answer: Motion capture is a technique in computer graphics that uses motion capture to capture the motion of an object or character

questions.question: What is the main purpose of a keyframe?
questions.correct_answer: To define the starting and ending points of an object or character's movement or pose
